content.rendered:
[vc_row full_width=”stretch_row_content” el_class=”custom-header” css=”.vc_custom_1626188023472{padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”][vc_column]

[vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

The Revenue Growth Platform

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row]

[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row full_width=”stretch_row” css=”.vc_custom_1626112167844{border-bottom-width: 5px !important;padding-top: 60px !important;padding-bottom: 60px !important;background-image: url(https://wp.static-cdn-shsp.com/wp-content/uploads/2021/06/SharpSpring_Grey_BG-scaled.jpg?id=208605) !important;}”][vc_column offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″]

Power Up Campaigns with SharpSpring Ads

[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row el_class=”overflow //gradient-lt-dk-gray-with-ss-while-logo” css=”.vc_custom_1589928570441{margin-bottom: 9rem !important;padding-top: 5% !important;padding-bottom: 5% !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ offset=”vc_col-lg-7 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-sm-offset-0 vc_col-xs-12″ css=”.vc_custom_1561135322185{margin-right: 10% !important;margin-bottom: 0px !important;padding-top: 0px !important;padding-right: 10% !important;padding-bottom: 0px !important;}”]

Discover how a big-ticket retailer grew revenue and reduced CPA with the power of SharpSpring Ads.

[vc_column_text css=”.vc_custom_1626812622141{margin-bottom: 20px !important;}” el_class=”list-unstyled list-chevron”]Before using SharpSpring Ads, Power Tank – which makes portable AC for off-road vehicles – had campaigns on autopilot that simply weren’t seeing conversions. They felt like they were throwing money down the drain. Because their products are niche and high-ticket, Power Tank needed to better align their ads with their target audience’s buyer journey.

So Power Tank linked up with SharpSpring Ads and was able to exponentially improve their campaign ROI. These days, they’re engaging their primed leads with relevant content and generating more revenue from their ad campaigns.

Explore how SharpSpring Ads helped Power Tank fully leverage their retargeting campaigns and generate more revenue in this case study.[/vc_column_text][vc_row_inner el_class=”custom-testimonial”][vc_column_inner offset=”vc_hidden-lg vc_hidden-md vc_hidden-sm vc_hidden-xs”][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”m-t-minus” offset=”vc_col-lg-5 vc_col-md-6 vc_col-xs-12″][vc_raw_html][/vc_raw_html][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column]

[/vc_column][/vc_row]
